title: New: Julia Losfelt â€“ Away
content:
Having collaborated with Parisian beatmaker ANDREA on a couple of tracks, the silky voiced Julia Losfelt has released her first original track.

The dreamy Away has all the makings of a blog hit, a blossoming number, building to an epic finale of reverb heavy vocals and hypnotic clicks. Check out Away below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
